task.summary: Autostart added, Polished UI, Added vibrations, and settings console including number of shakes, and shake sensitivity.
Added: user differentiability, ShowcaseView, IntroActivity, User profile, registered devices, clipboard history, grant permission module, launcher icon.
Addes: Open URL in browser option, minor UI fixes.
Added: Splash screen, status section, yoyo animations. Known Issues: Status section on reopening the app.
Added: Share Clipboard to friends, Olive Icon, Changed menu content background, Help menu
Added: Shortcut badger, Ripple Effect to buttons
Added: Authorization notification, notification icons, QR code scanner; Removed: Most of the runnables.; Changed: Icon
Added: Security, Removed a bug that produced error in Windows PC's app.
Added: More Security to email addresses
Removed share to friends, added push notifications, elaborated help section, added open dialer feature, removed a NPE.

MESSAGE.value: Autostart added, Polished UI, Added vibrations, and settings console including number of shakes, and shake sensitivity.
Added: user differentiability, ShowcaseView, IntroActivity, User profile, registered devices, clipboard history, grant permission module, launcher icon.
Addes: Open URL in browser option, minor UI fixes.
Added: Splash screen, status section, yoyo animations. Known Issues: Status section on reopening the app.
Added: Share Clipboard to friends, Olive Icon, Changed menu content background, Help menu
Added: Shortcut badger, Ripple Effect to buttons
Added: Authorization notification, notification icons, QR code scanner; Removed: Most of the runnables.; Changed: Icon
Added: Security, Removed a bug that produced error in Windows PC's app.
Added: More Security to email addresses
Removed share to friends, added push notifications, elaborated help section, added open dialer feature, removed a NPE.
